original_title: U.S. lie-monger fabricating falsehoods to smear China on South China Sea issue: report
article_summary: Report: U.S. accused of spreading false narratives to smear China over South China Sea disputes, according to a new Xinhua Institute report. The report highlights the U.S.'s role in fabricating falsehoods and distorting facts, while ignoring the root cause of the disputes: the Philippine occupation of Chinese islands and reefs.</s>
